OOC: Sorry, I thought you said Redhot was a female.

Cliffjumper curled his lip in disgust, both at the shape this Seeker was
in, and at the pathetic blubbering. "Yeah, well if you hold no
alligience to Decepticons, I won't hold your form against you." He
looked at Cliffjumper who nodded. "Do you wish to join us."

Firedrill looked up. "Well, he hasnt drawn any guns yet, that's good
news, right?" he asked, unsure of Cliffjumper's hatred for Decepticons.
